content.rendered:
88 Keys Fundraiser

The Fifth Canadian Chopin Piano Competition and Festival will be held from August 23 – 29, 2019 at The Royal Conservatory in Toronto. Polish Canadian pianist Krzysztof Jablonski will once again chair the international jury, and final rounds of both the Junior and Senior divisions will be held in Koerner Hall, providing the competitors with the opportunity to perform in a world-class performance space.

The 88 Keys Fundraiser presents the opportunity to support this prestigious event by sponsoring a key on the Festival piano. Your donation of $500 will allow you to select any available key, which will be marked with your name, or the name of somebody to whom you wish to dedicate it.  A banner with an image of the keyboard will be displayed in the lobby during the Festival, in the program book, and on the Chopin Society website. Keyboard sponsors will receive an income tax receipt for their donations.

The Canadian Chopin Competition and Festival is a unique event, serving as preparation for talented Canadian pianists who aspire to compete in the prestigious International Chopin Competition held in Poland every five years.

We invite you to consider sponsoring a key to contribute to the success of the 2019 Festival and Competition!

    Your Information

    * Upon submission of application you will be redirected to PayPal for payment.
